patterns: what is the eligibility for admission
how much marks is required for admission
I have pcm can i take admission in cse
responses:
Elibility criteria for:
  • B.Tech: Cleared 10+2 exams with PCM stream with atleast 45%(40% for reserved candidates).
  • M.Tech: Cleared B.Tech/B.E from any recognised University with atleast 55%(6.25 CGPA) for reserved category it is 50%
  • For MBA: Graduation degree with 50% marks(45% marks for SC/ST/OBC)
    • Want to know what documents you need to bring for admission process? Type "Required documents for admission"

patterns: How many companies visits in MITRC
responses:
MITRC has been continuously putting efforts to understand the needs of the industry in order to prepare engineers and managers for facing the emerging challenges. Cooperation of the industry sought in this regard has proved very helpful and students are getting placed in reputed companies in good numbers.

patterns: scope in computer science and engineering
responses:
Bachelor degrees open doors to many more computer science careers in software development, database administration, and computer programming. Graduates with associate degrees often pursue roles as computer support specialists or web developers. Since its inception during the Industrial Revolution, computer science has become essential to everyday life and changed nearly every part of society: Cyber security experts protect companies from foreign and domestic interference, while everyday people stream movies and connect with video conferencing technology.
  • Also check out the trending topics in CSE, for this type: trends in cse

Civil engineering is arguably the oldest engineering discipline. It deals with the built environment and can be dated to the first time someone placed a roof over his or her head or laid a tree trunk across a river to make it easier to get across.

responses: We are Proud to tell you that our college provides ragging free environment, and we have strict rules against ragging.

MITRC provides buses from:
  • 1. Alwar
  • 2. Bhiwadi
  • 3. Rajgarh
  • 4. Govindgarh.
  • If you live at one of these locations you can apply for bus services.
  • Contact Mr. Dinesh Bus In-charge: +91-9166586634.
  • To see the bus stop for your particular locations type: {your location} bus stops For eg. Alwar bus stops
MITRC bus stops in Alwar: <i> Shalimar, Telco chowk, Shivaji Park, Bhagat Singh... and almost everywhere in Alwar
MITRC bus stops in Bhiwadi: Tapukara, Gailpur, Tijara, Paladiya, Bhindusi, Noornagar, Bambora
MITRC bus stops in Govindgarh: Naugaon, Milakpur, Ramgarh, Bagad Tiraha, Desula, MIA, Bakhtal ki Chowki
MITRC bus stops in Rajgarh: Kothinarayanpur, Moonpur, Dhigawara, Bawdi Gate, Sumhel, Malakhera, Kalsara, Sonpur, Mahuwa, Burja, Bhogoor
